annotations.name: Specification
annotations.annotation: There is a HerokuDynoType dynotype, a Deployer deployer, dynotype shall sub1 synchronized with deployer shall setFreeDyno.
There is a HerokuDynoType dynotype, a Deployer deployer, dynotype shall sendDynoResponse synchronized with deployer shall receiveDynoResponse.
There is a HerokuRegion region, a Deployer deployer, region shall toUS synchronized with deployer shall setUSRegion.
There is a HerokuRegion region, a Deployer deployer, region shall toEU synchronized with deployer shall setEURegion.

There is a HerokuRegion region, there is a HerokuPostgres postgres, there is a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, there is a HerokuScoutAPM scout, there is a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, if region executes setAddonsForEU or region executes setAddonsForUS, postgres shall on or cleardb shall on or scout shall on or newrelic shall on.

There is a HerokuRegion region, there is a HerokuPostgres postgres, there is a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, there is a HerokuScoutAPM scout, there is a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, there is a Deployer deployer, if postgres executes on and cleardb executes on and scout executes on and newrelic executes on and deployer executes setAddonsForUS, region shall setAddonsForUS.

There is a HerokuRegion region, there is a HerokuPostgres postgres, there is a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, there is a HerokuScoutAPM scout, there is a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, there is a Deployer deployer, if postgres executes on and cleardb executes on and scout executes on and newrelic executes on and deployer executes setAddonsForEU, region shall setAddonsForEU.
There is a HerokuRegion region, a Deployer deployer, if region executes setAddonsForUS, deployer shall setAddonsForUS.
There is a HerokuRegion region, a Deployer deployer, if region executes setAddonsForEU, deployer shall setAddonsForEU.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, buildpack shall setJava synchronized with deployer shall setJava.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, buildpack shall setJvm synchronized with deployer shall setJvm.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, buildpack shall setPhP synchronized with deployer shall setPhp.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, buildpack shall setGo synchronized with deployer shall setGo.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForJava synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForScala synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForPython synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForRuby synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForNodejs synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForClojure synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForGradle synchronized with postgres shall off.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForJvm synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForPhp synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuPostgres postgres, buildpack shall setAddonsForGo synchronized with postgres shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, buildpack shall setAddonsForJava synchronized with cleardb shall on.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, buildpack shall setAddonsForGo synchronized with cleardb shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, buildpack shall setAddonsForJava synchronized with scout shall off.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, buildpack shall setAddonsForPhp synchronized with scout shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, buildpack shall setAddonsForGo synchronized with scout shall off.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForJava synchronized with newrelic shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForScala synchronized with newrelic shall off.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForPython synchronized with newrelic shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForRuby synchronized with newrelic shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForNodejs synchronized with newrelic shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForClojure synchronized with newrelic shall off.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForGradle synchronized with newrelic shall off.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForJvm synchronized with newrelic shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForPhp synchronized with newrelic shall on.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, buildpack shall setAddonsForGo synchronized with newrelic shall off.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForJava and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes off and newrelic executes on, buildpack shall setAddonsForJava.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForScala and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes off and newrelic executes off, buildpack shall setAddonsForScala.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForPython and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes on and newrelic executes on, buildpack shall setAddonsForPython.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForRuby and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes on and newrelic executes on, buildpack shall setAddonsForRuby.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForNodejs and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes off and newrelic executes on, buildpack shall setAddonsForNodejs.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForClojure and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes off and newrelic executes off, buildpack shall setAddonsForClojure.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForGradle and cleardb executes off and postgres executes off and scout executes off and newrelic executes off, buildpack shall setAddonsForGradle.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForJvm and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes off and newrelic executes on, buildpack shall setAddonsForJvm.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForPhp and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes on and newrelic executes on, buildpack shall setAddonsForPhp.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a HerokuPostgres postgres, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes setAddonsForGo and cleardb executes on and postgres executes on and scout executes off and newrelic executes off, buildpack shall setAddonsForGo.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForJava, deployer shall setAddonsForJava.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForScala, deployer shall setAddonsForScala.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForPython, deployer shall setAddonsForPython.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForRuby, deployer shall setAddonsForRuby.

There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForClojure, deployer shall setAddonsForClojure.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForGradle, deployer shall setAddonsForGradle.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForJvm, deployer shall setAddonsForJvm.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForPhp, deployer shall setAddonsForPhp.
There is a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, a Deployer deployer, if buildpack executes setAddonsForGo, deployer shall setAddonsForGo.
There is a HerokuPostgres postgres, a Deployer deployer, if postgres executes sendAddonResponse, deployer shall receiveAddonResponse.
There is a HerokuPostgres postgres, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes addHerokuPostgres, postgres shall sub1.
There is a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes addClearDBMySQL, cleardb shall sub1.
There is a HerokuScoutAPM scout, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes addScoutAPM, scout shall sub1.
There is a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, a Deployer deployer, if deployer executes addNewRelicAPM, newrelic shall sub1.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuDynoType dynotype, if deployer executes resetAll, dynotype shall reset.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuRegion region, if deployer executes resetAll, region shall USreset.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuRegion region, if deployer executes resetAll, region shall EUreset.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removeJava.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removeScala.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removeJvm.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removePython.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removeRuby.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removeNodejs.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removeClojure.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removeGradle.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removePhp.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuBuildpack buildpack, if deployer executes resetAll, buildpack shall removeGo.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuPostgres postgres, if deployer executes resetAll, postgres shall reset.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuPostgres postgres, if deployer executes resetAll, postgres shall off.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, if deployer executes resetAll, cleardb shall reset.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuClearDBMySQL cleardb, if deployer executes resetAll, cleardb shall off.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, if deployer executes resetAll, scout shall reset.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuScoutAPM scout, if deployer executes resetAll, scout shall off.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, if deployer executes resetAll, newrelic shall reset.
There is a Deployer deployer, a HerokuNewRelicAPM newrelic, if deployer executes resetAll, newrelic shall off.
all
